page.title: 16ST JAMES' SCHOOL
page.content: ST JAMES' SCHOOL IS A ROMAN CATHOLIC SCHOOL ON LONSDALE RD.IT TAKES CHILDREN FROM 4-5YRS TO 11.WHEN THEY REACH 11,THEY MOVE UP TO MILLOM COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL.THE CLASSES RANGE FROM INFANT 1-3 AND FROM JUNIOR 1-4.THERE ARE ABOUT 170 PUPILS IN THE SCHOOL.EACH YEAR RICHMOND TESTS ARE SET FOR THE UPPER JUNIORS,TO SEE WHETHER THEY HAVE LEARNT ANYTHING DURING THE YEAR.THERE IS A CHURCH ACROSS THE ROAD FROM OUR SCHOOL WHERE WE OFTEN GO FOR MASS.THERE ARE SEVEN TEACHERS IN OUR SCHOOL AND THE HEADMASTER IS CALLED MR.SUGDEN.HE IS GENERALLY NICE TO US AND IS A GOOD LAUGH.WE HAVE A SPORTS FIELD WHICH WE REGULARY USE FOR SPORTS AND GAMES.YOU CAN EITHER STAY FOR SCHOOL DINNERS,STAY FOR PACKED LUNCH OR GO HOME FOR YOUR DINNERS.MOST PEOPLE STAY FOR SCHOOL DINNERS.WE DO MANY SUBJECTS
